 2009-15302009-09-09,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActBank Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Cost of Borrowing (Authorized Foreign Banks) Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE COST OF BORROWING (Authorized Foreign Banks) REGULATIONS to improve the transparency of disclosures, the proposed amendments require that all disclosure under the regulations be made in a manner that is clear, concise and not misleading.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0259 Publication Date: 2009-09-30
